author: raxhvl
content: Geth is now passing 10/12 tests ðŸŽ‰

author: m0_ox
content:
To dive into the parametrized cases more, there are `31` tests total and Geth is passing all but `3` tests for `consume rlp`, which is the more straightforward implementation check.

- Failing `test_bal_block_rewards` test (beneficiary fee tracking)
- Failing 2/4 `test_bal_self_destruct` tests (both test cases where `same_tx` is `True` -- very edge case and was only just spec'd last week)

`consume engine` really only fails the 3 above as well but also all invalid tests because the exception mapper isn't set up to match appropriately yet. This is just the wrong exception mapping, not an implementation issue (more of a chore once implementation is closer to being stable).
